alert.note: Alert for Adair; Allen; Barren; Clinton; Cumberland; Metcalfe; Monroe; Russell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 20 at 11:07PM EDT until July 21 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of south central Kentucky, including the following counties, Adair, Allen, Barren, Clinton, Cumberland, Metcalfe, Monroe and Russell. * WHEN...Until 100 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1007 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Glasgow, Albany, Jamestown, Edmonton, Burkesville, Leslie, Russell Springs, Curtis, Dubre and Willow Shade.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route.

area.areaDesc: Adair; Allen; Barren; Clinton; Cumberland; Metcalfe; Monroe; Russell
